The price of inaction is far greater than the cost of making a mistake.
Fallacies do not cease to be fallacies because they become fashions.

Happiness is pretty simple: someone to love, something to do, something to look forward to.
The ego wants to go fast. The soul needs to go slow.

Remain calm, serene, always in command of yourself. You will then find out how easy it is to get along.
Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
Don't let the silly little dramas of each day get you down. For you are here to do great things.
You play the hand you're dealt. I think the game's worthwhile.
No one ever said life was fair. Just Eventful.
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
It's your outlook on life that counts.
Where you are right now doesn't have to determine where you'll end up.
Live your life and forget your age.
Strive for excellence, not perfection, because we don't live in a perfect world.
Life goes by very fast. And the worst thing in life that you can have is a job that you hate, and have no energy and creativity in.
Love the life you live, live the life you love.
Stop comparing yourself to others and focus on your own improvement.
Force has no place where there is need of skill.
To live is to be willing to die over and over again.
If someone betrays you once, it's their fault; if they betray you twice, it's your fault.
Life is a succession of lessons, which must be lived to be understood.
If the plan doesn't work, change the plan, but never the goal.
If you are lucky enough to find love, remember it is there and don't throw it away.

Behind every cloud is another cloud.
Don't let the past steal your present.

Never give way to laziness.

Life is filled with secrets. You can't learn them all at once.
